channel.title: Halp
channel.description:
How can I make it so it doesn't encrypt the passwords? I'm not trying to hack people or anything because if I was I'd download another server that doesn't have the encryption. I need it because when somebody changes there password with ::pass it changes it without the encryption witch messes up there account, and sometimes I need to get on there account to check stuff.
Any help appreciated.
Also does anybody know how to integrate the server accounts with mySQL? (I'm pretty good with mySQL just never used it with Java)
